subject: p18309149
Impression: AP chest compared to : Three right pleural tubes, two apical, one basal, are unchanged in their respective positions since, :24 pm. Nevertheless, moderate right pleural effusion is increasing and severe atelectasis or consolidation persists at the base of the right lung. Borderline cardiomegaly is stable. Left lung is grossly clear. Right apical pneumothorax is miniscule.
